original_text: Unto the sons of Gershom were given out of the family of the half tribe of Manasseh, Golan in Bashan with her suburbs, and Ashtaroth with her suburbs:
korean_text: 게르손 자손에게는 므낫세 반 지파 종족 중에서 바산의 골란과 그 초원과 아스다롯과 그 초원을 주고

sentences.original_text: Unto sons of Gershom were given
out of the family of the half tribe of Manasseh
Golan in Bashan with her suburbs
